meanings.definition: To give (money, time, knowledge, assistance, etc.) to help achieve or provide something
meanings.sent1: She contributes her time to volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The community contributes funds to support the school's programs.
meanings.sent3: His contribution to the bake sale contributes to the success of the event.
meanings.sent4: Each ingredient contributes to the delicious taste of the soup.
meanings.sent5: Every drop of water contributes to filling the bucket.

meanings.definition: To play a significant part in bringing about a result or outcome
meanings.sent1: Studying diligently contributes to good grades in school.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork contributes to the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: His funny joke contributes to the laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: The sun contributes to the warmth of a summer day.
meanings.sent5: Every player contributes to the team's victory.
